titleStmt.title: Cochin-China containing many admirable rarities and singularities of that countrey / extracted out of an Italian relation, lately presented to the Pope, by Christophoro Borri, that liued certaine yeeres there ; and published by Robert Ashley.
titleStmt.author: Borri, Cristoforo, 1583-1632.
Ashley, Robert, 1565-1641.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Raworth, for Richard Clutterbuck, and are to be sold at the signe of the Ball in Little-Brittaine,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
